basic.name: Jesus Francisco Cruz
basic.summary: Ingeniero en computación dispuesto en aprender nuevas tecnologías y mejorar mis habilidades. Me apasiona el desarrollo de software y disfruto trabajando en proyectos desafiantes que requieren soluciones innovadoras.

experiences.title: Analista de sistemas administrador de aplicaciones
experiences.details: Proporcionaba soluciones a las incidencias de las aplicaciones internas del banco y ambiente productivo, revisando configuraciones de los archivos properties y yamel desde el servidor,.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.details: Developed and maintained web applications for various clients. Key contributor in migrating legacy systems to cloud infrastructure.

experiences.title: Junior Developer
experiences.details: Worked on mobile app development, collaborating with design teams to create user-friendly applications.

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.details: Graduated with honors. Specialized in software development, data structures, and algorithms. Worked on various open-source projects and completed internships in tech companies.

education.title: Master of Science in Software Engineering
education.details: Focused on advanced algorithms, cloud computing, and full-stack development. Published research papers on scalable microservices architecture.
